channel.title: Sponsored page payment didnt go through
channel.description:
Hi,
After waiting about 20 minutes after my purchase (on this account), it stills says that I haven't paid, but I surely did. The paypal transaction ID is: 23K355050D217302U.
Thanks, Klaasvaakjes

item.title: Sponsored page payment didnt go through
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:551048”]That’s odd that 8/10 payments went through but not the last two…

Anyhow, I’ve manually marked you guys as paid and refunded you for 5 days of this month because I didn’t catch it in time, sorry about that.[/quote]thank you, i didn’t want to refund it through the bank anyways, it’s a long process

but why you’d disappear for 6 days D:

Read full topic

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That’s odd that 8/10 payments went through but not the last two…

Anyhow, I’ve manually marked you guys as paid and refunded you for 5 days of this month because I didn’t catch it in time, sorry about that.

item.title: Sponsored page payment didnt go through
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

[quote=“Editt, post:3, topic:551048”][quote author=silabgarza link=topic=669963.msg4479970#msg4479970 date=1428897364]
same issue happened for me yesterday when i paid

sent 2 messages to mitb yesterday and today and still no answer

hate to deal with bank but seems like i’m gonna end up having to dispute if he doesn’t show up in the next few days

i think his ipn broke or something
[/quote]

Its his new marketing technique[/quote]

well he hasn’t logged in for about 5 days
if he doesn’t randomly show up tomorrow, i’ll have to dispute the payment as i’m not even on the bidding anymore

Read full topic
